d.f: （`諺語~）`比喻~`一方~`有意~，`另~`一方~`卻~`無情~。
q: 《`醒世恆言~．`卷~`三~．`賣~`油~`郎~`獨占花魁~》：「`誰知~`朱~`重~`是~`個~`老實人~，`又~`且~`蘭花~`齷齪~`醜陋~，`朱~`重~`也~`看不上~`眼~。`以此~`落花有意，流水無情~。」

h.p: luò huā yǒu yì liú shuǐ wú qíng

English: lit. the falling flowers are yearning for love, but the heartless brook ripples on (idiom)
fig. one side is willing, yet the other one remains indifferent (usually of unrequited love)
